title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 229.4 - Prohibited practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 229.4 - Prohibited practices

State Regulations

With regard to a policyholder who does not make a timely premium payment and can demonstrate financial hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic, an insurer shall not: (a) impose any late fees relating to such premium payment; or
(b) report the policyholder to a credit reporting agency or refer the policyholder to a debt collection agency with respect to such premium payment. Notes

229.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
